questions.question: What is React.js?
choices: A Javascript library used for creating user interfaces
A human reacting to frontend use
A backend library making server calls
A css library to assist out-the-box styling
questions.answer: A Javascript library used for creating user interfaces

questions.question: Why is React.js so popular?
choices: Because it was developed by Facebook
It is not a popular library
User interfaces can be made more efficiently by using a virtual DOM to update states as needed
React.js completely replaces javascript using its own syntax
questions.answer: User interfaces can be made more efficiently by using a virtual DOM to update states as needed
